data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during ASIA cruise from Madagascar to Table Bay started at 1780-07-28

Ship: Asia (3rd Rate Frigate), Voyage: Madagascar - Table Bay, 1st Observer: George Vandeput (Captain), 2nd Observer: David Miller (1st Officer/Master), Company: Royal Navy, Other ship information: 64G 1346BM
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
